subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Coming off a dynamic 2006 in which he hit 41 homers and drove in 116 runs to compensate for his uninspiring debut season with the Mets, Carlos Beltrán has reverted back to his 2005 form.
snippet: Coming off a dynamic 2006 in which he hit 41 homers and drove in 116 runs to compensate for his uninspiring debut season with the Mets, Carlos Beltrán has reverted back to his 2005 form.
